title: How could I merge and organize two similar files for bookmarks?
content:
I'm in a messy situation right now

  1. I have two Windows installs with two separate installations of Firefox
  2. They are both different versions, one is the latest version and one is an extended support release: "115.23.1esr". I don't think that would really matter, just in case


Let's start. At the time, both installs with my bookmarks were the exact same

On one of my installs of Windows, I organized my bookmarks. I also put existing folders in new folders

And I thought that Firefox would synchronize my bookmarks with my other install. But it didn't happen.... at all! My bookmarks were the exact same as before... and still are!


  1. One install is organized but not completely up to date
  2. The other isn't organized and I've added a couple new bookmarks to it over time because of this stupid situation

What can I do here? And can I prevent this from happening in the future?

I can't depend on my bookmarks if it's not going to sync at all. It could be a malfunction on my end but I don't know at this point

'Wrote this question from my second install with the 115.23.1esr version'
creator: radicalblur

title: Mac OS desktop Firefox slow or stops working entirely
content:
For days I have been seeing Firefox be very slow to load a page (as in minutes) or stop working entirely. At the same time Chrome works fine. Mac Mail has become intermittent as well. I have uninstalled Norton products and changed Network proxy settings many times. Nothing helps. I have created new profiles. I switch between profiles. I have hacked into my WiFi router. Nothing, nothing helps. Safari hangs up too. Firefox on my android phone continues to work properly when using my Wifi router -the same router my Mac Studio connects to the internet with. I can access my third party mail service via Firefox on my android phone. Both FireTV devices work. I am at my wit's end. At this point I have shifted all of my work over to Chrome.

I have cleared caches. I have gotten rid of all cookies. I have restarted Firefox and rebooted my computer countless times.

Mac OS Sequoia 15.5 Firefox 138.04
creator: pdegroot
